EmailTemplate.name: MSP Countersigned Notice for Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: MSP countersigned notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Thank you for signing and returning your Maintenance Service Program (MSP) service agreement.
Attached please find the Honeywell countersigned copy for your records.
Your invoices are available online, and can be accessed by logging into https://myaerospace.honeywell.com
Thank you for your participation in our MSP Program and we look forward to providing you continued MSP service.
Please do not respond to this email as responses will not be received. Please use the email address of your MSP contract administrator.
Regards,
MSP Contracts
